snippet.title: Sal's Sublime Sundae - Explore a new world to find the ingredients to your masterpiece!
snippet.description:
Download for free on itch.io https://rustybailey.itch.io/sals-sublime-sundae?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt Making an ice cream sundae should be easy, right? Not for Sal! When a customer orders his off-menu delicacy, he is taken to a mysterious world to find the three remaining key ingredients to his Sublime Sundae.

➡️ More from Rusty Bailey https://rustybailey.itch.io/?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt
➡️ More metroidvanias https://itch.io/games/tag-metroidvania?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt

#itchio #indiegames
